page.title: 12 MRS COMPSON'S DAY
page.content: Mrs Compson gets up at 7.00 a.m each morning on school days and gets dressed. She takes her dogs for a walk at 7.30 and then prepares breakfast for her family. At 8.30 she gets into her car and goes to Shorne CE school where she teaches. Mrs Compson arrives at Shorne school at about 8.45 and gets the things she needs. She starts school at 8.55 and teaches until 12.15 with a 15 minute break when she has a cup of tea. Mrs Compson goes home for dinner and returns to teach in the afternoon. After school she usually takes clubs such as Netball or Rounders. At 5.00 pm Mrs Compson plays golf at Rochester and Cobham golf course and then goes home to get an evening meal. She then prepares for the next day at school and at 11.00 she goes to bed.
